title: New Firefox Dilemma
content:
I received a message stating that my current "Firefox" needed to be updated to '64-Bit'. I updated and lost all of my favorite icons (25+). I also have to create an entire new account and password as I'm told the old is not correct,Â ! I'm not happy in losing all of my previous information & email account on the older version that I've had for years!!!!!!! Can I retrieve, reload, etc....

[Personal information removed by moderator. Please read Mozilla Support rules and guidelines, thanks.]
creator: nipstoo

title: When I firsr opne Firefox I get a message saying something like "We can't find that page."
content: When I first open Firefox I usually get a message that we cannot find that page. I have my start page set to Google. Then when I refresh the page it usually opens but sometimes I need to refresh more than once. Then after that I can surf normally. Does anyone know what causes that? Is it an issue with my ISP or my router or something else? I though it might be the New Tab Override extension, but disabling it won't solve the problem. I have a 100 Mbps cable connection. I do not notice the same problem with Chrome.
creator: john2621

title: Gibberish instead of text on a number of sites. Using macOS
content: I get gibberish instead of text on a number of sites (Dqwt icpv'J gcxgp"J). Using macOS.
creator: goodnick

title: shortcuts on home page - cannot add
content:
I have ver 92 on a Win7 PC. I cannot add web site short cuts to home page. None of the suggestions out on web help.

on the blank "tiles" on home page, there is the 3 dots, but no option to edit. somehow I got one of these tiles filled out/in, but I cannot repeat it. I believe I dragged from bookmarks, does not now.
creator: d_penny
